item.title: OpenStack Setup Tenant
item.description: Prerequisites Have the account to the OpenStack env. Steps Login to the OpenStack GUI. Open 192.168.1.254 in Chrome or other web browser. [Do for the first time] Setup the Networks Navigate Project -> Network -> Networks, click Create Network. Input the network name and create a Subnet. Suggest using private subnets like: 172.16.*.* to 172.30.*.*. Input the DNS servers. Navigate Project -> Network -> Routers, click Create Router.
